entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 1.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 12:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: E 24 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 30 late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
